alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 3:52PM HST until March 13 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... .Strong westerly winds will continue through Monday. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts of 55 to 65 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
